item.title: A View of The Can
item.dc:creator: troyh
item.content:encoded: I haven't lived in Spokane (outside of a few three-day visits -- my max) in more than 14 years. According to this brutal view of my birth town, little has changed. Mostly I like the writing and someone else bashing the place I was so anxious to leave in high school, though I agree, the unflinching tone is a bit harsh even for sarcastic-me.
